DOC.brief_title: A Comparability Study Phase 3 Lot Single Commercial Lot NicVAX Healthy Adult Smokers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female smoker , age 1855 , currently smoke least 10 cigarette per day . Prior exposure NicVAX nicotine vaccine . History clinically significant allergic reaction . Use systemic steroid . Cancer cancer treatment within 5 year . HIV infection . History drug alcohol abuse dependence . Required treatment depression within past 12 month . Body mass index â‰¥ 30 [ calculate weight ( kg ) /height2 ( ) ] . Significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , psychiatric and/or respiratory disease .
